column5: It's same for me too but my guess is it might be because i want know what it was so i can replicate those traits/things and be funny/beautiful whatever so i can get more of those supplies.

This is so me, sometimes and depending on my anxiety level my brain starts to translate there words in a way as if they were ploting against me or say something bad about me even though i keep telling myself its all in my head just like thousand other times but being in that moment full of anxiety just sucks.

I haven't liked my birthdays either despite trying.
no cake no cards no nothing, just self pity and angry.
my last birthday was not that bad, i was with my SO and she baked me a cake and helped me try enjoy it.
well lately im at 0% so thats going good for me i guess ;D
yo, send me the link too please.

Same shit here, unlike other people i don't constantly whine about my situations and people think wow this dude got no problem except that i suffer from depression, anxiety, volatile mode swing and a economy struggled despite my very good income.
about some years ago i learned to express my empty pocket because my friends and family would always think im rich or some shit but greedy.

this same thing started for me for almost 3 years ago at first it was external male voice harrasing me blamming me for things i had done to myself cussing but no visuals. after some time the sound came from inside but mostly things i would consider as blasphemy and it would go in loop repeating same things over and over.
i still hear it sometimes but try to ignore for the most.
i also have thing tingling response from my left and right feet when iam trying to say something or guess
